dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 10 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com
April 21, 2005



Incident #1

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Small Businesses and Printing Services" by Scott Martin posted on the Article Insider web site at http://printing.articleinsider.com/31706_printing_services.html

Search Query: "No doubt, if you own a small or mid-sized business, you'll at some point need the use of professional printers."

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.internet-marketing-resource-tip.com/Services.htm

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Email of infringing website: n/a

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
Signature: [Signature]

Fax to: [private]




Incident #2

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Flyer Printing Can Increase Sales" by Scott Martin posted on the Article Insider web site at http://printing.articleinsider.com/31725_flyer_printing.html

Search Query: "Flyer printing can be done in a number of ways, and with a number of features."

Infringing Web Pages: www.omegadeltasigma.org/backyard_flyer.html

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Email of infringing website: [private]@omegadeltasigma.org

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Signature: [Signature]

Fax to: [private]




Incident #3

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Home Security in a Changing World" by Martha Kelley posted on the Article Insider web site at http://homesecurity.articleinsider.com/31962_home_security.html

Search Query: "With so many different types of home security systems out there, you should have no problem finding the solutions that best fit you and your family's needs."

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.home-security-systems.net/home-security.htm

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Email of infringing website: n/a (Phone: [private])

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."
